price: Maqaa Gooftaa keetii faarsi; gara isaattis citiinsa citi.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلۡ إِلَيۡهِ تَبۡتِيلٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kuri is'ma rabbika watabattal ilayhi tabtīlan
